- Introducing Mixers! A fun way to meet singles with similar interests, join online meetups and discover local events

- Earn badges to share and display on your profile

- View people you’ve 'Passed'

- A new, convenient 'More' section

- UI and performance improvements

- Support for 3D Touch

- Misc bug fixes
